scripts.dev:local: node --enable-source-maps --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.dev:watch: node --watch --enable-source-maps --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
